game.name: Jumpy Tiger
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Jumpy Tiger is a family-friendly collect-a-thon 2D platformer inspired by the classics of the 90s. Journey through seven unique levels and complete 35 missions, defeating enemies and avoiding hazards along the way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jumpy Tiger is a family-friendly collect-a-thon 2D platformer inspired by the classics of the 90s. Journey through seven unique levels and complete 35 missions, defeating enemies and avoiding hazards along the way.
